response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $8,000. Considering the exceptional quality and benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $7,200. This special offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while maintaining a competitive edge in your market. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 7200}
